ai-tika-vin09t4:132_1: ‘The meat of those animals whose name is allowable.’ Though I don’t speak of any ghee, he speaks for them.
ai-tika-vin09t4:132_2: Those animals who carry off my hands and feet had the thought,
ai-tika-vin09t4:132_4: They called sweet-natured, honey, delightful, and snarestemming in the Great Wood.
ai-tika-vin09t4:133_0: The training rule on tonics is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t4:134_0: The third sub-chapter on almsbowls is finished.
